ac1_sqlModule.description: SQL module supporting PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite with ORM abstraction

ac2_nosqlModule.description: NoSQL module for MongoDB, DynamoDB with document interface

ac3_cacheModule.description: Cache module for Redis, Memcached with TTL management

ac4_fileStorageModule.description: File storage for S3, Google Cloud, local filesystem

ac5_migrationToolsModule.description: Migration and backup tools with version control
